rules_text:
When False Trails enters the battlefield, each player investigates twice. [i](To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever a player sacrifices a Clue, look at the top card of that player’s library. You may put that card into its owner’s graveyard. [i](Do this before that player draws from the Clue.)[/i]
